name: Pet Subway Surfer
description:
Pet Subway Surfers is an amazing running game for Android. Run along the craziest scenarios in the Pet Subway Train City. Drag to jump or slide and to move left or right. Avoid hitting trucks, buses and subway trains. Run around the Pet Subway Train city, subway, forest and beach and gather all the coins you can.

Subway Train also gives you the chance of getting amazing gifts. Collect your daily gift each day and open mystery boxes to get some special rewards!

Subway Train is a very fun runner game. Download it now and start running!

FEATURES

★ Beautiful new graphics

★ Gorgeous new organic environments

★ New obstacles

★ More powerups

★ More achievements

★ Special powers for each character
